metadata.title: CVE-2024-50247 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fs/ntfs3: Check if more than chunk-size bytes are writtenA incorrectly formatted chunk may decompress intomore than LZNT_CHUNK_SIZE bytes and a index out of boundswill occur in s_max_off.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
